monkeyIsland.title: Monkey Island
monkeyIsland.description: The most popular and iconic route featuring stunning landscapes and rich history.
monkeyIsland.fullDescription: The most popular and iconic route of the Camino de Santiago. This 780km journey from Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port to Santiago de Compostela takes you through the stunning Pyrenees, the rolling hills of Navarra, the vast plains of Castilla y León, and the lush landscapes of Galicia.

emberaVillage.title: Emberá Village
emberaVillage.description: A coastal route with beautiful beaches and charming villages.
emberaVillage.fullDescription: Experience the coastal beauty of Portugal and Spain on this 620km route from Lisbon to Santiago. Walk through charming Portuguese villages, along stunning Atlantic beaches, and through the historic cities of Porto and Vigo before reaching your final destination.

cityTour.title: City Tour
cityTour.description: The northern route along the stunning Cantabrian coast.
cityTour.fullDescription: Follow the stunning Cantabrian coast on this 825km route from Irún to Santiago. This path offers breathtaking ocean views, charming fishing villages, and the rich cultural heritage of the Basque Country, Cantabria, and Asturias regions.

flashCityTour.title: Flash-City Tour
flashCityTour.description: The original route covering rugged mountains with spectacular scenery.
flashCityTour.fullDescription: The original Camino route from Oviedo to Santiago, covering 321km through the rugged mountains of Asturias and Galicia. This challenging but rewarding path offers spectacular mountain scenery and a true sense of the medieval pilgrimage experience.

footer.description: Discover the ancient pilgrimage routes of Spain with our expert-guided tours. Experience the magic of the Camino de Santiago.
